attributes.action: Ben and Jerry's mint flavour availablility
attributes.additional_details:
The Government should lobby Ben and Jerry's to sell their mint flavour's range in the United Kingdom. This discrimination whereby British subjects are deprived of such a basic ice cream flavour from such a reputable business is unacceptable. The government, as the representatives of the people, have a duty to to press our needs to the ice cream market.

The age of ice cream discrimination is over!
